game.name: Soul Maze
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Soul Maze is a semi-cooperative game for 2 to 4 friends. You are Light Souls, trapped together in the limbo. Work as a team to collect soul fragments and escape the maze — even if it means sacrificing your friends along the way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Soul Maze is a semi-cooperative game for 2 to 4 friends. You are Light Souls, trapped together in the limbo. Work as a team to collect soul fragments and escape the maze — even if it means sacrificing your friends along the way.
